name: create-conversation-thread
title: Create Conversation Thread
description: Set up a new conversation thread with initial context and metadata

arguments.name: purpose
arguments.description: Purpose of the conversation (e.g., "code review", "data analysis", "writing help")

template:
Create a new conversation thread for {{purpose}}. Set up appropriate metadata including user_id: "{{user_id || 'anonymous'}}", session_type: "{{purpose}}", and timestamp.{{#if context}}

Context: {{context}}{{/if}}

examples.title: Code review session
examples.description: Create a thread for code review with context

arguments.context: Reviewing Python web application for security and performance
